headline: Trump’s TikTok Buyer Is the Same Group Behind a Previous Stalled Bid
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The prospective buyer of TikTok’s American operations cited by President Donald Trump is the same investor consortium including Oracle Corp., Blackstone Inc. and venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz, whose bid for the app had stalled amid US-China trade tensions, according to a person familiar with the matter.Most Read from BloombergStruggling Downtowns Are Looking to Lure New CrowdsPhiladelphia Transit System Votes to Cut Service by 45%, Hike FaresSqueezed by Crowds, the Road

headline: Blackstone Inc. (BX) Acquires $2 Billion Worth of Commercial Mortgage-Backed Loans
summary: Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) is one of the best stocks in a Growth Stock Portfolio. Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) reported an intra-quarter realization update, with its realized performance revenues and investment income estimated at over $425 million. This income also includes proceeds from closed exits and incentive fees, indicating robust monetization activity across its portfolios. Amid a […]
